name: plc4xconnector
description: This is a class definition of PLC4X data connector.

image_tag.description: test docker image tag to render in yaml

yamlData:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: plc4xconnector
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: plc4xconnector
  template:
    metadata:
      name: plc4xconnector
      labels:
        app: plc4xconnector
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: plc4xconnector
          image: "wolfganghuse/plc4xconnector:{{ .Parameters.image_tag }}"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          securityContext:
            runAsUser: 9999
            allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          ports:
            - containerPort: 8000
